channel.title: I want super help from you guys!
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "I want super help from you guys!" - I am "Kakyou" from "Yume Village". Could some of you invite me to your Sparring list? I will do the same too...

item.title: Re: I want super help from you guys!
I want super help from you guys!
item.content:encoded:
Summary: I am "Kakyou" from "Yume Village". Could some of you invite me to your Sparring list? I will do the same too…

@Everyone - I just started playing BvS and I saw about Sparring Bonuses and thought that it would help me, greatly…

So so, can everyone do me a favour and add: Kakyou (Yume Village)
